title: How Jody Gerson Has Made Publishing ‘The Hot Business’ Right Now
summary: Since 2015, Billboard's Executive of the Decade has reigned as the most powerful woman in the business — boosting UMPG's revenue and championing songwriters at every step of the way.
body: On a sunny morning in October, Universal Music Publishing Group chairman/CEO Jody Gerson gathered her lieutenants around a table in her Santa Monica, Calif., office, Zooming in her overseas executives on a big screen, and proudly ­introduced what she described as evidence to inform the ­ongoing industry discussion on “whether AI will replace human artistry.” “I’m going to show you why it will not,” Gerson said, clad in a black leather jacket and her signature rose-tinted aviator glasses, cueing the dazzlingly original video for the operatic track “Berghain” that had just been released by Rosalía, whom Gerson signed in 2019 and has worked with closely ever since. “The reaction that this video’s getting just gives me hope that real artists will prevail.” Related How Rosalía Crafted Her Wildly Ambitious Album While Filming ‘Euphoria’: ‘For Some Reason, I Didn’t Completely Go Crazy’ Billboard Announces Lineup of Exclusive 2026 Grammy Week Events INXS, AC/DC, GANGgajang Lead Triple M's Most Played Songs in Network History Throughout the rest of the meeting, as each team member gave their updates, Gerson interjected frequently to offer support, asking if there was “anythi…

title: Galaxy S26 might make the storage upgrade Google Pixel refuses to – ditching 128GB
summary: As our phones become more and more important, storage does too, which is why the base storage tier on flagship phones has been moving up over the years. With the upcoming Galaxy S26, Samsung is reportedly finally moving away from a 128GB starting point, something we wish Google would do too. more…

title: Here’s Who Will Headline the Atlanta Braves’ First Country Fest
summary: The daylong festival will take place June 13.
body: The Atlanta Braves are trading in bats for guitars on June 13. The baseball team, in conjunction with Live Nation, will host the inaugural Braves Country Fest at their home stadium, Truist Park. Related Cody Johnson Scores His Highest Hot Country Songs Debut With ‘Travelin’ Soldier’ Ella Langley Announces Sophomore Album ‘Dandelion’: ‘I’ve Never Poured More of Myself Into a Project’ How Rare Is It for a Country Song by a Woman to Reach the Top 10 of the Hot 100? Headliner Cody Johnson will be joined by Ella Langley , ERNEST and MacKenzie Carpenter at the Truist-sponsored event. The paid concert will cap a daylong festival with free activations and performances at The Battery Atlanta. Performing at the Braves Country Hot Prospects showcase at the Whiskey Jam stage at the Georgia Power Pavilion at the Battery Atlanta will be hot newcomers Zach John King, Scoot Teasley and Colton Bowlin. “It has been our goal to create Atlanta Braves experiences that extend beyond the game of baseball, and Braves Country Fest presented by Truist will be an incredible celebration of the rich country music culture that permeates throughout Brave…
